name: Two-Timin' Towers
description:
Entry for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam.

Welcome to Two-Timin' Towers - a tower defense game where you have no control over your towers, meaning they'll attack everything in sight... even YOU! Turning a classic genre into a bullet hell.

Build towers to defeat increasingly challenging waves of enemies. But remember, each tower adds more bullets to the screen for you to narrowly avoid!

CONTROLS:

  • WASD - move
  • LEFT CLICK - select and place towers

CREDITS:

  • Aaron Shaw - Director / Co-Artist
  • Zachary Richman - Co-Director / Conceptual Designer / Writer
  • Phoenix Richard - Programmer
  • Huntrox - Programmer
  • Bluzi - Pixel Artist / Animator
  • Lord Neptune - Music
  • Adrian Karmanski - SFX
  • Victor Abda - Co-SFX
